clauses.title: The service can delete specific content without prior notice and without a reason
clauses.description: This service can delete specific content. Usually they will claim they reserve the right to do it at their sole discretion, which is legalese for saying they won't give a specific reason. If the terms say they will not notify you, it shall be included in the quote but if it does not explicitly say they will give you a notice, it can be reasonably inferred that they can do it without telling you.
clauses.clause_text: Company reserves the right to (i) remove, edit or modify any Content in its sole discretion, including without limitation any User Submissions, from the Site or Service at any time, without notice to you and for any reason (including, but not limited to, upon receipt of claims or allegations from third parties or authorities relating to such Content or if Company is concerned that you may have violated these Terms of Use), or for no reason at all

case.text: Specific content can be deleted without reason and may be removed without prior notice

clauses.title: This service forces users into binding arbitration in the case of disputes
clauses.description: This service forces users to use their own contracted arbitrator and forces users to waive their rights to jury trial.
clauses.clause_text:
Any dispute arising from or relating to the subject matter of this Agreement shall be finally settled by arbitration in San Francisco County, California, using the English language in accordance with the Arbitration Rules and Procedures of Judicial Arbitration and Mediation Services, Inc.
("JAMS") then in effect, by one commercial arbitrator with substantial experience in resolving intellectual property and commercial contract disputes, who shall be selected from the appropriate list of JAMS arbitrators in accordance with the Arbitration Rules and Procedures of JAMS.

case.text: You are forced into binding arbitration in case of disputes

clauses.title: This service gathers information about you through third parties
clauses.description: This Service may employ, either identifiable or non-identifiable, data collection from third party sources about you.
clauses.clause_text:
We may receive Personal Data relating to you from:

  • You directly when you provide us with information about you;
  • Your use of Bandcamp’s Service;
  • Third parties that provide us with information about you.

case.text: Information is gathered about you through third parties

clauses.title: Users have a reduced time period to take legal action against the service
clauses.description: If you wish to bring legal action against a service about a past incident, you may not be able to do so if the Terms you agreed to implied a limited amount of time. As a result it may be worthy to carefully read that section of the Terms to know exactly how much time you might have before your right to take legal action expires.
clauses.clause_text: You and Company agree that any cause of action arising out of or related to the Service must commence within one (1) year after the cause of action arose. otherwise, such cause of action is permanently barred.

case.text: You have a reduced time period to take legal action against the service

clauses.title: The service does not guarantee that software errors will be corrected
clauses.description: Users agree to use the service and its software as provided and accept that any errors within that software may not be corrected.
clauses.clause_text: Full Quote: "Company, and its directors, employees, agents, suppliers, partners and content providers do not warrant that: (a) the service will be secure or available at any particular time or location. (b) any defects or errors will be corrected. (c) any content or software available at or through the service is free of viruses or other harmful components. or (d) the results of using the service will meet your requirements."

case.text: The service does not guarantee that software errors will be corrected

clauses.title: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.
clauses.description: If the service gets acquired or is involved in a merger, bankruptcy, reorganisation or sale, your personal data may be transferred or sold.
clauses.clause_text: if Bandcamp, or substantially all of its assets were acquired, or in the unlikely event that Bandcamp goes out of business or enters bankruptcy, customer information would be one of the assets that is transferred or acquired by a third party.

case.text: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction

clauses.title: This service assumes no liability for unauthorized access to your personal information
clauses.clause_text: Company will not be liable for the privacy of e-mail addresses, registration and identification information, disk space, communications, confidential or trade-secret information, or any other Content stored on Company’s equipment, transmitted over networks accessed by the Site, or otherwise connected with your use of the Service.

case.text: This service assumes no liability for unauthorized access to your personal information

clauses.title: Usernames can be rejected for any reason
clauses.description: The service's terms explain they may change or remove usernames at their sole discretion, and they may do so without prior notice.
clauses.clause_text: Company reserves the right to refuse registration of, or cancel a User ID and domain in its sole discretion.

case.text: Usernames can be rejected or changed for any reason

clauses.title: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics
clauses.description: For instance, Google Analytics, rather than self-hosted (first-party) statistics software.
clauses.clause_text: <li>We use Google Analytics to collect and process analytical data about users of Bandcamp’s website.

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for statistics

clauses.title: You can request access and deletion of personal data
clauses.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text: "Subject to applicable law, you may have the right to: [...] request access to and receive information about the Personal Data we maintain about you,[...] update and correct inaccuracies in your Personal Data, object to or restrict the processing of your Personal Data, and have the information blocked, anonymized or deleted, as appropriate."

case.text: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data

clauses.title: The cookies used by this service do not contain information that would personally identify you
clauses.description: The cookies used only collect anonymous, aggregated data that cannot be linked to a unique identity.
clauses.clause_text: Bandcamp cookies do not collect Personal Data, and we do not combine the general information collected through cookies with other Personal Data to tell us who you are or what your screen name or email address is.

case.text: The cookies used by this service do not contain information that would personally identify you

clauses.title: You maintain ownership of your data
clauses.description: This service does not claim ownership over user-generated content or materials, and the user doesn't need to waive any moral rights by posting owned content.
clauses.clause_text: For clarity, the foregoing license grant to Company does not affect your other ownership or license rights in your User Submission(s), including the right to grant additional licenses to the material in your User Submission(s), unless otherwise agreed in writing;

case.text: You maintain ownership of your content

clauses.title: This service provides archives of their terms of service so that changes can be viewed over time
clauses.description: This case applies to Services whose agreements provide previous versions, so that users can compare them and understand how the Service seems to evolve regarding user rights.
clauses.clause_text:
Change log.

June 10, 2014: Added three new paragraphs to Fees and Payments- Fans to clarify that in the event of an infringement claim, we may be required to revoke streaming access to prior purchases.

August 8, 2014: Modified Fan Personal Information - Fans section to clarify use of e-mail addresses with respect to Fan Accounts, and Intellectual Property Rights section to cover music videos.

July 20, 2015: Modified Acceptance of Terms section and changed defined term “Band” to “Artist” in connection with introduction of Label accounts. Modified Fees and Payments - Fans, Fees and Payments - Artists, and Limitation of Liability sections in connection with updated payment process for Digital Content. Modified Fan Personal Information - Fans and Fan Personal Information - Artists sections in connection with new Artist Subscription service.

November 17, 2017: Added Fees and Payments – General and modified Fees and Payments – Fans and Fees and Payments – Artists sections in connection with updated payment system.

case.text: Archives of their agreements are provided so that changes can be viewed over time

clauses.title: This service allows you to retrieve an archive of your data
clauses.description: Users can request a copy of the data collected through the services and infer from it the amount of personal information that is processed and stored by the Service. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text: "Subject to applicable law, you may have the right to: [...] receive copies of the Personal Data we maintain about you, exercise your right to data portability,"

case.text: You can retrieve an archive of your data

clauses.title: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy describes in detail the data collected through the website and through the services provided.
clauses.clause_text: What Personal Data Does Bandcamp Collect?

case.text: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect

clauses.title: The service provides information about how they intend to use your personal data
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy explains the purposes for which data is collected and the way it is processed, used and shared.
clauses.clause_text: For Which Purposes Will Bandcamp Use Your Personal Data?

case.text: Information is provided about how your personal data is used

clauses.title: This service does not sell your personal data
clauses.description: This service makes an explicit promise not to sell "personal data" of users.
clauses.clause_text: Is my personal information going to be re-sold to some random third-party advertiser? No, we only use personal information for the purposes of improving Bandcamp and our users experience on Bandcamp.

case.text: Your personal data is not sold

clauses.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
clauses.description: You can stop using the service and/or cancel or delete your account at any time for any reason. Moreover, the termination is reasonably fast and simple.
clauses.clause_text: If you wish to terminate your account, then you may do so by following the instructions on the Site.

case.text: You have the right to leave this service at any time

clauses.title: The user is informed about security practices
clauses.description: It's important to know what security measures are taken to protect your data from unauthorized access. This case applies to the Agreements that precisely explain their security practices.
clauses.clause_text:
Is Personal Data About You Secure?

Bandcamp endeavors to protect user information to ensure that your Personal Data is kept private. We use physical, managerial, and technical security measures to protect your Personal Data against accidental or unlawful destruction, loss, alteration, unauthorized disclosure or access. In particular, we take steps to ensure that our employees and service providers who have access to your Personal Data only process it upon our instructions, unless otherwise required by law.

case.text: Information is provided about security practices

clauses.title: The service has non-exclusive use of your content
clauses.description: The service can pay for your content and you are allowed to make it commercially available to other services/parties.
clauses.clause_text: Each Artist uploading Music to the Service grants Company and its authorized sublicensees and distributors, if any, the worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free, right and license to:

case.text: The service has non-exclusive use of your content

clauses.title: You can opt out of promotional communications
clauses.description: You can update your account preferences and/or easily unsubscribe of email/sms lists to stop receiving promotional communications.
clauses.clause_text: You can at any time tell us not to send you marketing communications by email by clicking on the unsubscribe link within the marketing emails you receive from us or by contacting us as specified in the “How To Contact Us” section below.

case.text: You can opt out of promotional communications

clauses.title: You can choose with whom you share content
clauses.description: Users can decide whether or not they want their content to be shared and they can control how and with whom it is shared.
clauses.clause_text: <li>You may designate certain User Submissions as private so that they are not shared with other users.

case.text: You can choose with whom you share content

clauses.title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
clauses.clause_text: You shall defend, indemnify, and hold harmless Company and its affiliates, authorized sublicensees and distributors, and each of their employees, contractors, directors, suppliers and representatives, from any and all liabilities, claims, and expenses, including reasonable attorneys' fees and court costs, that arise from or relate to your use or misuse of, or access to, the Site, Service, Content or otherwise from your User Submissions, violation of these Terms of Use, or infringement by you, or any third party using the your account, of any intellectual property or other right of any person or entity, and for breach of any of your representations and warranties in these Terms of Use.

case.text: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service

clauses.title: This service employs a broad copyright license over user content including the right to distribute through any media
clauses.clause_text: including without limitation for promoting and redistributing part or all of the Site (and derivative works thereof) or the Service in any media formats and through any media channels (including, without limitation, third party websites), whether now known or hereafter developed.

case.text: Your content can be distributed through any media known now or in the future

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.
clauses.clause_text:
Bandcamp Terms of Use

Effective Date: November 17, 2017

case.text: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

clauses.title: This service has a no refund policy with some exceptions
clauses.description: Payments can be refunded if some requirements are fulfilled.
clauses.clause_text: Any fees paid hereunder are non-refundable, except as provided in this Agreement.

case.text: This service has a no refund policy with some exceptions

clauses.title: This service prohibits users sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages
clauses.description: Users are not allowed to use the service for chain letters, junk mail, spamming or any other distribution of content to people who have not agreed to receiving it.
clauses.clause_text: <li>constitutes unauthorized or unsolicited advertising, junk or bulk e-mail ("spamming");

case.text: You are prohibited from sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages

clauses.title: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially, unless you are selling your own music
clauses.description: Users can't use the Service for commercial purposes (unless the Service consents): it is only for personal, individual purposes.
clauses.clause_text: The Service (including, without limitation, any Content) is provided only for your own personal, non-commercial use (except with respect to individual recording artists, collections of recording artists,Artist Entities or Represented Artists (each, an “Artist”) selling Music, Merchandise or other Content (each as defined below) as authorized through the Service).

case.text: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.

clauses.title: Spidering or crawling is not allowed
clauses.clause_text: (v) use manual or automated software, devices, or other processes to “crawl” or “spider” any page of the Site.

case.text: Spidering, crawling, or accessing the site through any automated means is not allowed

clauses.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk
clauses.description: This service does not provide any guarantees as to its usability or fitness for the users' purposes. Users agree to use it at their own risk, accepting any possible bugs, malfunctions or harm to their devices.
clauses.clause_text: The Service is provided "as is" and "as available” and is without warranty of any kind, express or implied, including, but not limited to, the implied warranties of title, non-infringement, merchantability and fitness for a particular purpose, and any warranties implied by any course of performance or usage of trade, all of which are expressly disclaimed.

case.text: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk

clauses.title: Users agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content
clauses.description: This service prohibits users from submitting content of a variety of types. This can include content that is unlawful, harassing, abusive, threatening, libelous, sexist, racist, homophobic, transphobic, or discriminatory in any other way.
clauses.clause_text: threatening, abusive, harassing, defamatory, libelous,

case.text: You agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content

clauses.title: This service is only available to users of a certain age
clauses.description: The Services are intended for users who are at least a certain age. If you are younger than the age required then you are prohibited from using the Service.
clauses.clause_text: The Service is available only to individuals who are at least 16 years old.

case.text: This service is only available to users over a certain age

clauses.title: If you are the target of a copyright claim, your content may be removed
clauses.description: The content you have published on the service may be removed if it infringes copyright.
clauses.clause_text: block access to or remove material that it believes in good faith to be the intellectual property of a third party (e.g., copyrights, trademarks, trade secrets, etc.) that has been illegally copied and distributed by any of our advertisers, affiliates, content providers, members or users.

case.text: If you are the target of a copyright claim, your content may be removed

clauses.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account
clauses.description: You are responsible for protecting the confidentiality of your password and for maintaining the security of your account. Any activity occurring under your account is your responsibility, whether authorized by you or not.
clauses.clause_text: You are solely responsible for activity that occurs on your account and shall be responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your Company password.

case.text: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

clauses.title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder
clauses.description: Should any portion of the Terms of Service be unenforceable or invalid, that portion will be enforced to the fullest extent permitted by applicable law and the remainder of the TOS will remain valid and enforceable.
clauses.clause_text: If any provision of these Terms of Use is found to be unenforceable or invalid, that provision will be limited or eliminated to the minimum extent necessary so that these Terms of Use will otherwise remain in full force and effect and enforceable.

case.text: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder

clauses.title: The service informs users that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites
clauses.description: The service states that whenever it links to third party websites or applications, its privacy policy does not apply. Those third party websites or applications hosted or operated by other organizations may have their own privacy policies.
clauses.clause_text:
The Service may contain links to other sites.
Bandcamp is not responsible for the privacy policies and/or practices on other sites.
When linking to another site you should read the privacy policy stated on that site.

case.text: The service informs you that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites

clauses.title: Provides instructions on how to submit a copyright claim
clauses.description: If content that you own is copied or made accessible through the service in a way that constitutes an intellectual property right infringement, you can report it following the instructions given in the agreements.
clauses.clause_text:
Procedure for Reporting Claimed Infringement:

If you believe that material or content residing on or accessible through the Company Web site or service infringes an intellectual property right that you own or control, please send a notice of claimed infringement containing the following information and only the following information to the Designated Agent listed below.

case.text: Instructions are provided on how to submit a copyright claim

clauses.title: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision
clauses.description: Even if the service does not or not always enforce all of the rules or provisions contained in its terms, they still apply. Users can at a later time still be held accountable for violating provisions that have not been enforced consistently.
clauses.clause_text: The failure of either party to exercise in any respect any right provided for herein shall not be deemed a waiver of any further rights hereunder.

case.text: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision

clauses.title: Third parties are involved in operating the service
clauses.clause_text: Third parties may also collect information about your website activity over time and on other websites or mobile applications.

case.text: Third parties are involved in operating the service

clauses.title: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet the users' expectations or requirements
clauses.description: This service provider informs its users that the services, information, products, or other materials provided on its website may not meet the users' expectations or requirements.
clauses.clause_text: (d) the results of using the service will meet your requirements.

case.text: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet your expectations or requirements

clauses.title: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.
clauses.description: The Terms may be updated without prior notice, but users will be notified of the changes at the moment they will start applying.
clauses.clause_text:
Changes to this Privacy Policy

Bandcamp may amend this Privacy Policy from time to time. Use of information we collect now is subject to the Privacy Policy in effect at the time such information is used. If we make changes in the way we use Personal Data, we will notify you by posting an announcement on our Service or sending you an email.

case.text: The terms may be changed at any time, but you will receive notification of the changes
